body: @DaBestMayne Yepp, right. Egawa tesseis Golden Boy main character Kintaro is literaly the perfect pre-yapoo with an exzessiv kink for spit, toilets and femdom serving/beatings.

The kanji reading is wrong or at least incomplete. It is "Gekiga (not really the title it means story/novel comic): Kachiku-jin yapū" (a short novel by Numa Shōzō). It means "Human Cattle Yapoo" (which are the dehumanized Japanese people in the "dystopian utopia" of the masochistic author lol). Egawa Tessei also made a version of the same story.
